name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Quantitative Python Developer with expertise in Python and **pandas** for data processing and analysis. Skilled in SQL for database management and API development, while adept at employing **Pytest** for robust testing and maintaining high-quality code. Strong capabilities in **Linux** environments, multithreading, and multiprocessing to enhance application performance. Knowledgeable in object-oriented and functional programming, statistics, time series analysis, and financial mathematics. Proven track record of delivering scalable and efficient solutions across various sectors, ensuring a user-centric approach through clean and maintainable code practices.
